text: @NYGovCuomo 🤦🏼‍♀️. Are you going to memory hole this executive order like the one you did REQUIRING that NURSING HOMES take in #Covid19 patients then blamed it on #Trump saying it was his policies. Funny how only blue Dem run states had that issue..red states didn’t 🤷🏼‍♀️. #CuomoKilledThousands
